Reviews.Title: “clean, cosy, gay friendly”
Reviews.Author: lefils
Reviews.Content: me and my partner stayed in this hotel for easter. the location is very good and just a walking distance from Sultanahmet and historical sites. there are two groceries close to hotel, a bunch of restaurants. the only problem that i can sat is that the door were not sound proof and we woke up every now and then because somebody walking or talking in corridor, those with high hill shoes were the word.. taq taq taq, we could even hear the sound of forks and knives from breakfast room. the last night of our stay i could not sleep because in one of the rooms had a get together . the rooms are so clean, staff so friendly and welcoming, they speak english and are really helpful. the breakfast is good, served in a nicely decorated room. we loved the hotel, except the noise , my partner believed the reception is in our room as we could hear each and every single conversation.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel to stay”
Reviews.Author: MartinaV213
Reviews.Content: Mari Time is great place to stay. Very nice, new, clean and comfortable hotel situated in calm, side street, just few steps from main sightseeings and sea side. English speeking staff, very helpful, great service, providing us with all needed information. Room was very nice, cleaned, comfortable beds. Breakfast was very rich, big choice of juices, cheese, ham, vegetables, jams, pancakes, sweets. I will definatelly recommend this hotel to my friends and will return to stay here. Dont hesitate to book Mari Time hotel. If you stay for 3 or more nights, they provide free pick up from the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for Tourists Wanting Comfort”
Reviews.Author: rekeGermany
Reviews.Content: Overall I can only recommend this hotel. It is new small and personal. Everything was in perfect working order, almost brand new, clean and tidy. Reception was very friendly and helpful - with the night staff communication in English or German was a problem, but somehow we managed to communicate. As the room safe was too small for our notebooks, we deposited themn at reception. The rooms were spacious (probably around 18mÂ²) and nicely decorated in the regional style. The bathroom was quite adequate, even though it was somewhat small. Free WLAN worked well enough for normal internet research. The only minor complaint was that the breakfast starting time was not always punctual, which meant that one had to rush to keep early appointments. The breakfast quantity and variety were quite in oder - there was some variation form day to day - and there was always enough to satisfy varying tastes - even if one cannot call it a "luxury breakfast". The quality might be improved somewhat in some respects (the juices tasted more like sweetened syrups than fresh juice, the scrambled eggs often were lumpy and caked together (egg powder?) and a plain unsweetened muesly would be a pleasant alternative to the sweetened cereals).

Reviews.Title: “nice comfy convenient”
Reviews.Author: Rouge K
Reviews.Content: nice hotel, small rooms, great location though. walking distance from the blue mosque. Sadly breakfast was all gone by 10:30, we reached at 10:30 two days in a row and there wasn't even any coffee left. The rooms were kept clean and the staff was extremely polite and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “New small luxury but affordable hotel on Golden Horn”
Reviews.Author: Magda d
Reviews.Content: The Hotel Mari Time has only been open for a month at the time of the review and we found it clean, beautifully furnished, with a lovely breakfast and friendly staff. Walking distance from the Haga Sofia, Blue Mosque, Grand Bazaar and where city tours commence from, with quaint little restaurants and fabulous shops in close proximity. A wonderful place to start explorting Istanbul from.

Reviews.Title: “excelent hotel on oldcity-sultanahmet”
Reviews.Author: BÃ¼lent A
Reviews.Content: We have been to at the hotel for a weekend to visit all historical atractions in sultanahmet and we found maritime hotel on walking distance to walk to blue mousqe,s.sofia,topkapi palace and garnd bazaar.Lovelly staffs very clean and large rooms and on the terrace perfect sea views.

Reviews.Title: “Our hotel”
Reviews.Author: Zhivko Z
Reviews.Content: We spent a lovely vacation in Maritime Hotel. The hotel is located on a small cozy alley at very center of old town, right behind Blue Mosque and near to St. Sofia and Sultanahmet square (Hippodrome). Excellent starting point for a tourist and quick access to city transport. Polite and very useful staff. As far as, this was our first visit of Istanbul they were very kind and helpful guiding us. Initially, I heard contradictory opinions about hotels in Istanbul thus, I was a bit suspicious. Fortunately, everything was superb and we were pleased staying at Maritime hotel. Actually, I was told the hotel is brand new, 1 month old. Place is quiet even though, the Blue Mosque is close to the hotel, very good noise isolation. Everything is new and shine. There is a roof terrace with beautiful view. Continental breakfast, I would say rather good. Little bit diversity would be great. Weâ€™ve got nice weather and we spent very nice days in a remarkable city. If the hotel was a dump that would ruin our vacation. I am glad, I picked Maritime hotel up. There is a lot to see in Istanbul and definitely, we will visit it again soon. Certainly, Maritime is our hotel.

Reviews.Title: “cool”
Reviews.Author: DC221
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel, friendly staff, situated very good. Everything your need for your trip in Istanbul to be perfect.

Reviews.Title: “next year we will definitely return to this hotel”
Reviews.Author: eladim
Reviews.Content: excellent located, just few minutes walk to the main attractions from Sultanahmed - Aya Sofia, Topkapi Palace, Basilica Cistern....- very friendly and helpful staff and excellent services (arrangement for one day trip to Efes, transfers to/from airport, check in/out very flexible connecting with flight time, free WI-FI everywhere, wake-up and call for taxi...) every request is promptly solved. Another important feature it's that the hotel is completely new, with an special design regarding all the small details and still improve ( roof terrace and to the front of the hotels,for smokers, of course, so the morning coffe is more...comfortable); clean rooms, quiet area and everybody smiles too nice !!!!

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel with excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Rob B
Reviews.Content: Hotel in good location, staff was excellent, price -very reasonable

HotelInfo.Name: Mari Time Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Kucuk Ayasofya Mahallesi Cayiroglu Sokak No.9 Sultanahmet | Sultanahmet, Istanbul 34122, Turkey
